meanings.definition: A small metal or plastic tube used to bind the ends of a lace or ribbon.
meanings.sent1: She carefully threaded the aiglets onto the ribbon to secure it in place.
meanings.sent2: The aiglets on her shoelaces were shiny and silver.
meanings.sent3: The aiglets decided to have a race to see who could bind the ribbon faster.
meanings.sent4: The aiglets gleamed like tiny jewels at the ends of the laces.
meanings.sent5: The aiglets clicked softly as she tied the ribbon, like tiny locks closing.

meanings.definition: The metal or plastic tip at the end of a shoelace.
meanings.sent1: He replaced the worn-out aiglets on his shoelaces with new ones.
meanings.sent2: The aiglets on her sneakers were red and matched her outfit.
meanings.sent3: The aiglets giggled as they swung back and forth on the shoelaces.
meanings.sent4: The aiglets stood proudly at the tips of the laces, like miniature flags.
meanings.sent5: The aiglets jingled softly with each step, adding a musical touch to her walk.
